title: Exam Grades
question_text: A college professor displays the distribution of her final exam scores for her five classes using a variety of graphs. The graph below shows the distribution of exam scores for Monday's class. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved. Which class has a higher center than Monday's class?

choices.text: Tuesday's class:   Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.
Wednesday's class:   Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.
Thursday's class:   Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.
Friday's class:   Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.
All of these choices have centers that are lower than Monday's class center.
